alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Natrona County through 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bar Nunn, or 7 miles northwest of Casper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. A plethora of small hail could cover the ground, and briefly on roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casper, Mills, Evansville, Bar Nunn, Homa Hills, Casper-Natrona County International Airport, and Casper Events Center. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 176 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
